sentence.Network_en: The two eldest are already doing well at Kings Wood.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ieldest, eldest, of Germanic origin; related to German ältest, also to eld and old

entry.def: The eldest person in a group is the one who was born before all the others.

example.ex: The eldest child was a daughter called Fiona...
example.tran: 老大是个女孩，名叫菲奥娜。

example.ex: David was the eldest of three boys...
example.tran: 戴维是3个男孩中年龄最大的一个。
